item.title: Lies of P: Overture
item.description:
Title: Lies of P: Overture
Genre: Action , Adventure , RPG
Developer: NEOWIZ
Publisher: NEOWIZ
Franchise: NEOWIZ
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025




About This Content

Cross the Bounds of Time

Lies of P: Overture is a dramatic prequel to the acclaimed soulslike action RPG, Lies of P. It transports you to the city of Krat in its final days of haunting, late-19th-century Belle Époque beauty. On the brink of the Puppet Frenzy massacre, you follow a legendary Stalker—a mysterious guide—through untold stories and chilling secrets. As Geppetto’s deadly puppet, you’ll journey through Krat and its surroundings, uncover hidden backstories, and face epic battles that shape the past and future of Lies of P.

“Geppetto’s puppet… We need your help.”

Return to the City of Krat.

Discover Its Unexplored Horror and Splendor.

Venture into a past Krat when its Belle Époque elegance faces impending ruin. Explore majestic, never-before-seen locations, from extravagant landmarks on its outskirts to opulent mansions and eerie, haunted ruins.

Confront formidable new enemies and uncover secrets hidden within the city’s decaying grandeur.

Travel Back in Time.

Meet the Legendary Stalker.

Before the awakening lies the truth. Join Lea, the Legendary Stalker, on her relentless path of vengeance. A veil is lifted to reveal a hidden chapter of Krat's dark past.

Discover untold stories behind both new and familiar characters as you explore the gripping drama and mysteries that shape this rich and haunting world.

Forge New Weapons.

Master New Combat Styles.

Cunning enemies lurk within unfamiliar labyrinths and treacherous terrain, waiting to end your story. Ruthless, punishing, and even majestic, these adversaries will test your mettle. Only the most resourceful, doughty, and daring will prevail.

As you delve deeper into its expanded world you'll unlock powerful new armaments, including a brand-new arsenal of weapon combinations and Legion Arms, giving you unprecedented freedom to forge a combat style uniquely yours.

Overcome Treacherous Odds.

Face intense, high-stakes encounters through Krat’s labyrinths and various surroundings.

Confront powerful new bosses and enemies as you fight to uncover the mysteries of a world teetering on the edge of collapse.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This product contains violence, blood and gore, as well as fear elements.



System Requirements

Windows

MacOS

item.title: Dragon Is Dead
item.description:
Title: Dragon Is Dead
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG
Developer: TeamSuneat
Publisher: PM Studios, inc.
Release Date: Jun 6, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jun 7, 2024




About This Game

Prologue

The black dragon [Guernian], who once faced down the gods, has fallen. From the rift he fled before his death, an unholy energy has spread across the world, and life is undergoing a bizarre mutation. People call it Corruption and live their days in fear, but few know its trustworthy source and full extent.

Player = Successor

You are an immortal warrior, a so-called Successor, chosen by the God of Light [Lu], the God of Fire [Ashuran], and the God of Water [Harnia]. When you die in battle, you return to the source of your lineage and are resurrected, growing stronger through the experience, equipment, and rune power you accumulate along the way. Arriving in Cliffshire, a town of light, the Successors must head to a burial ground where demons are said to be manifesting and follow clues to cleanse the distorted world.

Core Gameplay

The game plays out as 2D platformer action requiring precise dodging and pattern-breaking. Each area is a vertically and horizontally intertwined, multi-layered structure that regenerates in a rogue-lite fashion with different terrain, monster placement, and loot composition on each exploration. When you die, you lose your gold and temporary buffs, but your gear and runes are permanently preserved and become the basis for the next cycle. Defeating bosses yields rune stones that can be used to craft or awaken legendary gear, and artifacts found during exploration can bring both powerful blessings and dangerous curses depending on the combination, providing new tactical tension each time.

The current situation

Corrupted enemies are gradually expanding their territory, threatening neighboring regions. In this chaos, the Black Dawn is leading the Corruption from behind the scenes, but their true purpose is shrouded in mystery. Lore says that only by destroying the [Guernians] will the lost order return, but the deeper you explore, the more you question the truth of even this belief. The closer you get to the citadel, the more you'll come face-to-face with the greater secret that brought the world to its knees.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: windows 10+
    • Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia 450 Gts / Radeon HD 5750 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
    Recommended:
    • OS: windows 10+
    • Processor: Dual Core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800 or better

item.title: Holoidle
item.description:
Title: Holoidle
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: Kindred Interactive
Publisher: holo Indie
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

Step into a fantastic world of streaming! Holoidle is a relaxing idle game where you click and strategize to gain Influence and grow your audience. Purchase assets, collect Collab Cards , and keep your chat engaged for perfect efficiency!

Three playable talents for you to choose

  • 🦈 Gawr Gura - The legendary shark idol from Atlantis!

  • ⚓ Houshou Marine - The pirate captain arrives!

  • 💀 Calliope Mori - The reaper is here to collect souls!

Collect cards from a collection of 100 unique Hololive-themed cards

Earn Holocoins by playing and use them to obtain Collab Cards —each one featuring iconic references and talents from Hololive history.

⭐ Rarity System – Cards range from One-Star to Four-Star Legendary , with increasing power and synergy effects.

✨ Foil Cards – Collect 10 copies of a card to unlock a special Foil Version with boosted stats!

🔧 Strategize! – Some cards enhance assets, while others improve the strength of your overall deck. Combine them to create your own unique strategy!

Maximize Your Influence Gains!

Equip up to six Collab Cards at a time to supercharge your influence generation. Placement matters—combine synergies and position cards strategically to turn a modest 10% bonus into game-changing multipliers!

✨ Foil Cards = Double the Power! Collect 10 copies of a card to unlock its Foil Version, doubling its effectiveness.

⚡ Optimize! – Experiment with different builds to find the most powerful combinations!

Keep Your Idol Happy!

Your idol needs love and care! Cook meals, clean up, and decorate their home with unlockable furniture to keep them happy and productive.

💎 Holocoins – Your idol generates 1 Holocoin every 40 minutes , but keep them happy and they’ll double their earnings to 1 every 20 minutes!
🎨 Customize Their Space – Unlock and arrange furniture to create the perfect idol retreat.
🍳 Tend To Their Needs – Feed, clean, and interact with your idol to strengthen your bond and boost your progress!

Restart, Reinvent, Rise!

Encore lets you reset your progress while making your next run even stronger!

🔄 Endless Progression – Each encore doubles your base Influence per Second and stacks infinitely.
✨ Foil Power-Up – A random card in your collection upgrades to a Foil Version , boosting its stats.
🃏 Keep Your Collection – All previously earned Collab Cards remain, letting you optimize your strategy with every cycle.

This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)

This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".

Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.

CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"

holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.

It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.

For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows® 10
    • Processor: 3.3 GHz Intel Core i3-3220 (2 cores, 4 threads), AMD Ryzen 3 1200 3.1 GHz (4 cores) or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better, ATI Radeon X1300 or better, Intel GMA X4500 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows® 10 or higher
    • Processor: Intel core i5 (4 cores), AMD Ryzen 5 or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7750, or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description:
Title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
Genre: Action , Indie , Simulation
Developer: threeW
Publisher: PlayWay S.A.
Franchise: PlayWay S.A.
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

In a world where the dead turn into zombies, your job is to manage your very own Graveyard! Perform burials and cremations, fulfill visitor requests, manage facilities, and keep your staff and defenses in top shape. But when night falls, everything changes. The dead may rest, but the zombies don’t. They are coming for your precious work!

Visitor Satisfaction is Key

After processing the bodies, visitors will return to check on their loved ones. Your duty is to keep graves intact while providing fresh flowers and maintaining a welcoming environment. Every visit rewards you with valuable bonuses to help your business thrive.

Visitors can also stop by the Chapel to rest and browse the Souvenir Shop for small keepsakes like candles and incenses. A clean and decorated graveyard encourages greater generosity while donating!

Build your Defenses

Each night, waves of zombies will come with their numbers growing and special zombie types emerging, hungry for freshly buried bodies and for you. From basic defenses like barbed wires and fences to advanced machines like automatic turrets, keep your defenses upgraded, repaired, and fully stocked with ammo to withstand the night.

Trust your Arsenal

With a variety of weapons, including pistols, rifles, shotguns, and your trusty shovel, you are the ultimate force against the Zombies. As you level up, unlock and purchase new weapons to become even stronger. Just make sure to stock up on enough ammo!

Even a Graveyard Can Be Cozy Sometimes!

Use your Farming Area to grow different flowers for profit and vegetables to simply eat and restore your energy and health. With Upgrades, you can even unlock a Grinder to turn zombie parts into Fertilizer. Decorate your Graveyard with benches, lights, and other ornaments to make it truly your own.

Expand and Upgrade Your Facilities

Your graveyard isn’t just a resting place, it's a business, and every upgrade matters. Expand your burial areas and upgrade your crematorium with more furnaces and automated systems. Improve your water supply , manage resource production , and decorate your grounds to stay ahead of growing demands.

Hire a team of employees to help with day-to-day tasks: the Florist keeps flowers running, the Gravekeeper maintains burials and cremations, the Gardener keeps your farm in check, and the Technician ensures all machines run smoothly.

Every improvement helps you stay one step ahead of both business demands and the undead threat.

Key Features

  • Manage and expand your own graveyard while balancing business and survival

  • Build and maintain defenses against nightly zombie attacks

  • Perform burials, cremations, and keep visitors satisfied with flowers and souvenirs

  • Operate a Chapel with a donation system and a fully stocked Souvenir Shop

  • Hire staff like Florists, Gravekeepers, Gardeners, and Technicians

  • Upgrade facilities including the crematorium, farming area, and water systems

  • Unlock new weapons and enhance your combat skills

  • Customize your graveyard with decorations and functional upgrades

  • Experience a mix of management, strategy, and first-person action

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or better
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 970 / AMD RX 470 or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Supports FSR and DLSS. A compatible NVIDIA or AMD graphics card is required for the best performance.
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
    • Processor: i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or better
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 XT or better
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 5 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Supports FSR and DLSS. A compatible NVIDIA or AMD graphics card is required for the best performance.

item.title: Parallel Experiment
item.description:
Title: Parallel Experiment
Genre: Adventure , Indie
Developer: Eleven Puzzles
Publisher: Eleven Puzzles
Franchise: Cryptic Killer
Release Date: Jun 5, 2025




About This Game

IMPORTANT : "Parallel Experiment" is a 2-player cooperative puzzle game with escape room-like elements. Each player must have their own copy on either mobile, tablet, PC or Mac (cross-platform play is supported).

In the game players take on the roles of two detectives who are often separated, each with different clues, and must work together to solve puzzles. Internet connection and voice communication are essential. Need a Player Two? Join our community on Discord! Find the link on the side of our Steam page.

Parallel Experiment is a noir-inspired adventure with a comic book art style, featuring detectives Ally and Old Dog. While following the trail of the dangerous Cryptic Killer, they suddenly become his targets and are now unwilling participants in his twisted experiment.

This is the second standalone chapter in the “Cryptic Killer” cooperative point-and-click puzzle game series. You can play Unboxing the Cryptic Killer first, if you want to learn more about our detectives and their nemesis, but Parallel Experiment can be enjoyed without prior knowledge .

KEY FEATURES

🔍 Two Player Co-Op

​ In Parallel Experiment , players must rely on their communication skills as they’re separated and must each discover unique clues that are vital for solving puzzles on the other end. Teamwork is essential to crack the Cryptic Killer’s codes.

🧩 Challenging Collaborative Puzzles

​ There are over 80 puzzles striking the perfect balance between challenging yet fair. But you're not facing them on your own! Communicate with your partner on how to best proceed, solve a puzzle on your end that unlocks the next step for them and discover a wide variety of puzzles from redirecting water flows, finding computer passwords and unlocking intricate locks, to deciphering cryptic ciphers, soldering electronic components, and even waking up a drunk!

🕹️ Two Can Play That Game

​ Looking for a break from the main investigation? Dive into a variety of retro-inspired mini-games designed with a fresh cooperative twist. Challenge each other to darts, Three in a Row, Match Three, Claw Machine, Push and Pull, and more. Think you know these classics? We’ve reinvented them for a whole new co-op experience

🗨️ Cooperative Dialogues

​ Uncover vital clues through collaborative conversations. NPCs respond dynamically to each player, offering new layers of interaction that only teamwork can unravel. Some conversations are puzzles in themselves that you need to solve together!

🖼️ A story told in panels

Our love for comic books shines in Parallel Experiment. Every cutscene is presented as a beautifully crafted comic book page, immersing you in a gripping, noir-inspired narrative.

How many pages did we create to tell the story? Almost 100 pages! Even we were surprised by how much it took, but every panel was worth it to deliver a story that keeps you on edge until the very last frame.

✍️ Draw on… Everything!

​ Every detective needs a notebook. In Parallel Experiment , players can jot down notes, sketch solutions, and interact with the environment in creative ways. But we all know what you're going to draw first…

🐒 Annoy Each Other

​This is a key feature? Yes. Yes, it is. ​

​Each level will have some way for players to annoy their co-op partner: knock on a window to distract them, poke them, make their screens shake. You already know you'll be doing this just by reading it, right?

Parallel Experiment has a variety of mind-twisting challenges that push the boundaries of cooperative puzzle design, offering situations never seen before in other games.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS
